text: Scotland is an unincorporated community in southwestern Van Buren County, Arkansas, United States, near the head of the South Fork of the Little Red River. In April 2010, a tornado struck this community which resulted in extreme damage. == Education == Public education for elementary and secondary school students is provided by the Clinton School District, which leads students to graduate from Clinton High School. Scotland was a part of the Scotland School District until July 1, 2004, when that district consolidated with the Alread School District into the existing Clinton school district."ConsolidationAnnex_from_1983.xls." Arkansas Department of Education. Retrieved on May 23, 2018. ==References== Category:Unincorporated communities in Van Buren County, Arkansas Category:Unincorporated communities in Arkansas
title: Scotland, Arkansas
